RETURNS AND EXCHANGES POLICY
Effective Date: January 1, 2024
Policy Number: CS-POL-001
Version: 2.1

================================================================================
1. POLICY OVERVIEW
================================================================================

This policy governs all returns and exchanges for products purchased through our 
online, mobile, and retail channels. All customer service representatives must 
adhere strictly to these guidelines to ensure consistent application of our 
return and exchange procedures across all regions and customer tiers.

================================================================================
2. RETURN WINDOW AND ELIGIBILITY
================================================================================

2.1 Standard Return Window
    Returns are accepted within the following timeframes from the date of 
    delivery, as confirmed by carrier tracking:
    
    - United States (US): 60 calendar days
    - Canada (CA): 60 calendar days
    - European Union (EU): 30 calendar days
    - United Kingdom (UK): 30 calendar days
    - Australia (AU): 45 calendar days
    
    The return window begins on the date of delivery, not the date of purchase.

2.2 Eligible Items for Return
    Items are eligible for return if they meet ALL of the following criteria:
    
    a) Returned within the applicable return window (Section 2.1)
    b) In original, unworn condition with all original tags attached
    c) In original packaging when applicable
    d) Not classified as final sale, clearance, or special promotion items
      (unless explicitly stated otherwise in the promotion terms)
    
2.3 Condition Requirements
    Items must be in one of the following acceptable conditions:
    
    - Unworn: Item has never been worn or used, with all tags and packaging intact
    - Tried Indoors: Item was tried on indoors only, shows no signs of wear,
      and all tags remain attached
    
    Items in the following c

output.reason: Size/fit return outside 60-day window or condition requirements not met.
output.customer_response: I understand your request. While I can't accommodate this specific request per our policy, let me explain the policy and see what alternatives we can offer.

    - Does NOT re

WARRANTY POLICY
Effective Date: January 1, 2024
Policy Number: CS-POL-006
Version: 1.5

================================================================================
1. POLICY OVERVIEW
================================================================================

This policy governs warranty claims for manufacturing defects and product 
quality issues. It defines what is covered under warranty, warranty duration, 
claim procedures, and resolution processes. All customer service 
representatives must understand these guidelines to properly evaluate and 
process warranty claims.

================================================================================
2. WARRANTY COVERAGE
================================================================================

2.1 Standard Warranty Period
    We provide a manufacturer's warranty covering manufacturing defects for a
    period of ONE (1) YEAR from the date of purchase. This warranty applies to
    all products sold through our channels unless otherwise stated.

2.2 What is Covered
    The warranty covers manufacturing defects including but not limited to:
    
    - Material defects: Fabric tears, material failure, premature wear due to
      manufacturing issues
    - Construction defects: Seam failures, sole separation, zipper malfunctions,
      button/closure failures
    - Sizing defects: Incorrect size labels (item does not match labeled size)
    - Component defects: Missing parts, defective hardware (buckles, clasps,
      etc.), faulty electronics in smart products
    - Color/finish defects: Premature fading, color bleeding, finish defects
      not caused by normal wear
    - Manufacturing errors: Items that do not meet stated specifications due to
      production errors

2.3 What is NOT Covered
    The warranty does NOT cover:
    
    - Normal wear and tear from intended use
    - Damage caused by misuse, abuse, or accidents
    - Damage from improper care (wrong washing methods, etc.)
    - Damage

output.reason: Manufacturing defect confirmed. Customer may choose replacement, repair, or refund.
output.customer_response: Your warranty claim has been approved. You can choose between a replacement, repair, or full refund for this manufacturing defect.
output.next_action: Process warranty claim and offer resolution options

input.policy_document:
TAX AND DUTY POLICY
Effective Date: January 1, 2024
Policy Number: CS-POL-010
Version: 1.3

================================================================================
1. POLICY OVERVIEW
================================================================================

This policy governs sales tax, value-added tax (VAT), customs duties, and 
related tax and duty inquiries for domestic and international orders. It 
clarifies our responsibilities versus customer responsibilities and provides 
guidance for handling tax and duty-related customer questions.

================================================================================
2. DOMESTIC SALES TAX
================================================================================

2.1 Sales Tax Collection
    We collect sales tax on orders shipped to addresses in jurisdictions
    where we have tax nexus (physical presence or economic activity
    thresholds). Sales tax is calculated based on:
    - Shipping address (destination-based)
    - Product taxability in that jurisdiction
    - Current tax rates at time of purchase
    
    Sales tax is displayed at checkout before order completion.

2.2 Tax-Exempt Purchases
    Tax-exempt purchases may be available for:
    - Qualified resellers (with valid resale certificate)
    - Tax-exempt organizations (with valid exemption certificate)
    - Certain product categories exempt in specific jurisdictions
    
    Tax exemption requires:
    - Valid exemption certificate provided before purchase
    - Certificate verification and approval
    - Tax exemption applied to account or specific order

2.3 Sales Tax Refunds
    If sales tax incorrectly charged:
    - Refund tax amount if error confirmed
    - Process refund within 1-2 business days
    - Tax refund appears in 5-10 business days
    - If tax-exempt certificate provided post-purchase: Refund tax if
      certificate valid and retroactively applicable

2.4 Sales Tax Inquiries
    Common customer questions:

output.reason: Tax/duty inquiry addressed. Taxes collected per regional requirements. Duties are customer responsibility for international orders.
output.customer_response: I can help you with this request. Let me process this for you right away.

FRAUD AND CHARGEBACK POLICY
Effective Date: January 1, 2024
Policy Number: CS-POL-005
Version: 1.4

================================================================================
1. POLICY OVERVIEW
================================================================================

This policy establishes procedures for handling fraud claims, unauthorized 
transactions, chargebacks, and identity verification. All customer service 
representatives must follow strict protocols to protect both customers and the 
company from fraudulent activity while providing appropriate support to 
legitimate fraud victims.

================================================================================
2. UNAUTHORIZED TRANSACTION CLAIMS
================================================================================

2.1 Initial Response
    When customer reports unauthorized transaction:
    - Take claim seriously and show empathy
    - Gather initial information: transaction date, amount, order number
    - Verify customer identity before discussing account details
    - Do NOT dismiss claim or assume customer error
    - Document all information immediately

2.2 Identity Verification Required
    Before processing any fraud-related request, customer MUST verify identity:
    
    Required verification methods (at least TWO of the following):
    a) Account password or security question answer
    b) Last 4 digits of payment method used
    c) Billing address verification
    d) Email verification (click link sent to account email)
    e) Phone verification (call to registered phone number)
    f) Government-issued ID (for high-value claims)
    
    If customer cannot verify identity, escalate to fraud specialist team.
    Do NOT process refunds or make account changes without verification.

2.3 Investigation Process
    Upon verified fraud claim:
    - Immediately flag account for security review
    - Freeze account if multiple suspicious activities detected
    - Review recent

output.reason: High-value fraud claim requires fraud specialist review.

ORDER MODIFICATION POLICY
Effective Date: January 1, 2024
Policy Number: CS-POL-007
Version: 1.3

================================================================================
1. POLICY OVERVIEW
================================================================================

This policy governs order modifications including cancellations, address 
changes, size/color changes, and item substitutions. It defines when 
modifications are possible and the procedures for processing them. All customer 
service representatives must understand these guidelines to properly handle 
order modification requests.

================================================================================
2. ORDER MODIFICATION WINDOWS
================================================================================

2.1 Modification Eligibility by Order Stage
    Order modifications are possible only during specific stages of order
    fulfillment:
    
    a) Order Placed (Not Yet Processed)
       - Cancellation: Available
       - Address Change: Available
       - Size/Color Change: Available
       - Item Addition: Available (if inventory allows)
       - Item Removal: Available
    
    b) Order Processing (Picked, Not Yet Shipped)
       - Cancellation: Limited availability (may require escalation)
       - Address Change: Available (with potential delay)
       - Size/Color Change: Limited (requires cancellation and reorder)
       - Item Addition: Not available
       - Item Removal: Limited availability
    
    c) Order Shipped (In Transit)
       - Cancellation: Not available (order in transit)
       - Address Change: Limited (contact carrier, not guaranteed)
       - Size/Color Change: Not available (process return after delivery)
       - Item Addition: Not available
       - Item Removal: Not available
    
    d) Order Delivered
       - All modifications: Not available (use return/exchange process)

========================================================================

output.reason: Limited modification available after fulfillment begins.

LOYALTY POINTS AND REWARDS POLICY
Effective Date: January 1, 2024
Policy Number: CS-POL-008
Version: 1.4

================================================================================
1. POLICY OVERVIEW
================================================================================

This policy governs our loyalty program, including points earning, points 
redemption, points posting timelines, tier benefits, and points-related 
inquiries. All customer service representatives must understand these 
guidelines to properly assist customers with loyalty program questions and 
issues.

================================================================================
2. LOYALTY PROGRAM STRUCTURE
================================================================================

2.1 Membership Tiers
    Our loyalty program has four tiers:
    
    - Guest: No membership, no automatic benefits
    - Member: Free membership, 5% automatic discount, points earning
    - VIP: Enhanced membership, 10% automatic discount, bonus points,
      exclusive promotions
    - Employee: Special employee tier with employee-specific benefits
    
    Tier benefits are cumulative (VIP includes all Member benefits plus
    additional VIP benefits).

2.2 Points Earning Rate
    Points are earned on qualifying purchases:
    - Members: 1 point per $1 spent (1% back in points)
    - VIP: 1.5 points per $1 spent (1.5% back in points)
    - Employees: Per employee policy (confidential)
    - Guests: No points earned (must join program)

2.3 Qualifying Purchases
    Points are earned on:
    - Product purchases (full price, sale, clearance)
    - Gift card purchases (points earned on purchase, not redemption)
    
    Points are NOT earned on:
    - Shipping fees
    - Taxes
    - Returns and refunds (points deducted if item returned)
    - Using points for purchase (no points on points)

================================================================================
3. POINTS POSTING TIMELINE
==

PROMOTIONS AND PRICING POLICY
Effective Date: January 1, 2024
Policy Number: CS-POL-003
Version: 2.3

================================================================================
1. POLICY OVERVIEW
================================================================================

This policy governs all promotional offers, discounts, pricing adjustments, 
price matching, and related customer inquiries. All customer service 
representatives must strictly adhere to these guidelines to ensure consistent 
application of promotional terms and prevent unauthorized discounts.

================================================================================
2. RETROACTIVE PROMOTIONS
================================================================================

2.1 General Rule: NO RETROACTIVE APPLICATIONS
    Promotional codes, discounts, and sale prices apply ONLY to purchases made
    DURING the active promotion period. We do NOT apply promotions retroactively
    to orders placed before a promotion begins, even if the promotion starts
    shortly after the original purchase date.

2.2 Promotion Period Definition
    - Start Date: Promotion begins at 12:01 AM in the promotion's primary
      time zone (typically Eastern Time for US promotions)
    - End Date: Promotion ends at 11:59 PM in the promotion's primary time zone
    - Orders must be placed AND confirmed within this window to qualify

2.3 Exceptions to Retroactive Rule
    The following situations MAY qualify for retroactive price adjustment
    (requires supervisor approval):
    
    a) Order placed within 24 hours before promotion start AND customer
       contacts us within 48 hours of promotion start
    b) Technical error prevented customer from applying valid promotion code
       at time of purchase (verified through system logs)
    c) Customer service error where representative incorrectly stated promotion
       would apply retroactively
    
    All exceptions require:
    - Supervisor approval

================================================================================

online, mobile, and retail channels. All customer service representatives must 
adhere strictly to these guidelines to ensure consistent application of our 
return and exchange procedures across all regions and customer tiers.

================================================================================
2. RETURN WINDOW AND ELIGIBILITY
================================================================================

2.1 Standard Return Window
    Returns are accepted within the following timeframes from the date of 
    delivery, as confirmed by carrier tracking:
    
    - United States (US): 60 calendar days
    - Canada (CA): 60 calendar days
    - European Union (EU): 30 calendar days
    - United Kingdom (UK): 30 calendar days
    - Australia (AU): 45 calendar days
    
    The return window begins on the date of delivery, not the date of purchase.

2.2 Eligible Items for Return
    Items are eligible for return if they meet ALL of the following criteria:
    
    a) Returned within the applicable return window (Section 2.1)
    b) In original, unworn condition with all original tags attached
    c) In original packaging when applicable
    d) Not classified as final sale, clearance, or special promotion items
      (unless explicitly stated otherwise in the promotion terms)
    
2.3 Condition Requirements
    Items must be in one of the following acceptable conditions:
    
    - Unworn: Item has never been worn or used, with all tags and packaging intact
    - Tried Indoors: Item was tried on indoors only, shows no signs of wear,
      and all tags remain attached

TAX AND DUTY POLICY
Effective Date: January 1, 2024
Policy Number: CS-POL-010
Version: 1.3

================================================================================
1. POLICY OVERVIEW
================================================================================

This policy governs sales tax, value-added tax (VAT), customs duties, and 
related tax and duty inquiries for domestic and international orders. It 
clarifies our responsibilities versus customer responsibilities and provides 
guidance for handling tax and duty-related customer questions.

================================================================================
2. DOMESTIC SALES TAX
================================================================================

2.1 Sales Tax Collection
    We collect sales tax on orders shipped to addresses in jurisdictions
    where we have tax nexus (physical presence or economic activity
    thresholds). Sales tax is calculated based on:
    - Shipping address (destination-based)
    - Product taxability in that jurisdiction
    - Current tax rates at time of purchase
    
    Sales tax is displayed at checkout before order completion.

2.2 Tax-Exempt Purchases
    Tax-exempt purchases may be available for:
    - Qualified resellers (with valid resale certificate)
    - Tax-exempt organizations (with valid exemption certificate)
    - Certain product categories exempt in specific jurisdictions
    
    Tax exemption requires:
    - Valid exemption certificate provided before purchase
    - Certificate verification and approval
    - Tax exemption applied to account or specific order

2.3 Sales Tax Refunds
    If sales tax incorrectly charged:
    - Refund tax amount if error confirmed
    - Process refund within 1-2 business days
    - Tax refund appears in 5-10 business days
    - If tax-exempt certificate provided post-purchase: Refund tax if
      certificate valid and retroactively applicable

2.4 Sales Tax Inquiries
    Common customer questions:

output.reason: Tax/duty inquiry addressed. Taxes collected per regional requirements. Duties are customer responsibility for international orders.

Effective Date: January 1, 2024
Policy Number: CS-POL-011
Version: 1.2

================================================================================
1. POLICY OVERVIEW
================================================================================

This policy governs product restrictions, regional compliance requirements, 
age restrictions, export controls, and regulatory compliance issues. It 
provides guidance for handling customer inquiries about restricted products, 
shipping restrictions, and compliance-related questions.

================================================================================
2. REGIONAL SHIPPING RESTRICTIONS
================================================================================

2.1 Restricted Regions
    Some products may not be available for shipment to certain regions due to:
    - Regulatory restrictions
    - Export controls
    - Product-specific regulations
    - Carrier limitations
    - Business decisions
    
    Restricted regions and products are identified in our system and at
    checkout.

2.2 Restricted Product Categories
    Certain product categories may have regional restrictions:
    - Electronics with specific certifications
    - Products with battery restrictions
    - Items subject to import regulations
    - Products requiring special licenses
    - Items restricted by destination country laws

2.3 Handling Restricted Orders
    If customer attempts to order restricted product:
    - System prevents order completion if restriction detected
    - Customer notified of restriction at checkout
    - Alternative products suggested if available
    - Explanation provided for restriction when possible
    - Customer service can clarify restrictions but cannot override

2.4 Regional Compliance Requirements
    Orders must comply with:
    - Destination country import regulations
    - Product-specific regulations (safety, certification, etc.)
    - Export control law

ORDER MODIFICATION POLICY
Effective Date: January 1, 2024
Policy Number: CS-POL-007
Version: 1.3

================================================================================
1. POLICY OVERVIEW
================================================================================

This policy governs order modifications including cancellations, address 
changes, size/color changes, and item substitutions. It defines when 
modifications are possible and the procedures for processing them. All customer 
service representatives must understand these guidelines to properly handle 
order modification requests.

================================================================================
2. ORDER MODIFICATION WINDOWS
================================================================================

2.1 Modification Eligibility by Order Stage
    Order modifications are possible only during specific stages of order
    fulfillment:
    
    a) Order Placed (Not Yet Processed)
       - Cancellation: Available
       - Address Change: Available
       - Size/Color Change: Available
       - Item Addition: Available (if inventory allows)
       - Item Removal: Available
    
    b) Order Processing (Picked, Not Yet Shipped)
       - Cancellation: Limited availability (may require escalation)
       - Address Change: Available (with potential delay)
       - Size/Color Change: Limited (requires cancellation and reorder)
       - Item Addition: Not available
       - Item Removal: Limited availability
    
    c) Order Shipped (In Transit)
       - Cancellation: Not available (order in transit)
       - Address Change: Limited (contact carrier, not guaranteed)
       - Size/Color Change: Not available (process return after delivery)
       - Item Addition: Not available
       - Item Removal: Not available
    
    d) Order Delivered
       - All modifications: Not available (use return/exchange process)

========================================================================

Policy Number: CS-POL-006
Version: 1.5

================================================================================
1. POLICY OVERVIEW
================================================================================

This policy governs warranty claims for manufacturing defects and product 
quality issues. It defines what is covered under warranty, warranty duration, 
claim procedures, and resolution processes. All customer service 
representatives must understand these guidelines to properly evaluate and 
process warranty claims.

================================================================================
2. WARRANTY COVERAGE
================================================================================

2.1 Standard Warranty Period
    We provide a manufacturer's warranty covering manufacturing defects for a
    period of ONE (1) YEAR from the date of purchase. This warranty applies to
    all products sold through our channels unless otherwise stated.

2.2 What is Covered
    The warranty covers manufacturing defects including but not limited to:
    
    - Material defects: Fabric tears, material failure, premature wear due to
      manufacturing issues
    - Construction defects: Seam failures, sole separation, zipper malfunctions,
      button/closure failures
    - Sizing defects: Incorrect size labels (item does not match labeled size)
    - Component defects: Missing parts, defective hardware (buckles, clasps,
      etc.), faulty electronics in smart products
    - Color/finish defects: Premature fading, color bleeding, finish defects
      not caused by normal wear
    - Manufacturing errors: Items that do not meet stated specifications due to
      production errors

2.3 What is NOT Covered
    The warranty does NOT cover:
    
    - Normal wear and tear from intended use
    - Damage caused by misuse, abuse, or accidents
    - Damage from improper care (wrong washing methods, etc.)
    - Damage

output.reason: Normal wear and tear is not covered under warranty. Warranty covers manufacturing defects only.
output.customer_response: I understand you're experiencing an issue with your item. Unfortunately, this appears to be normal wear rather than a manufacturing defect, so it's not covered under warranty. However, I can help you explore other options.

TAX AND DUTY POLICY
Effective Date: January 1, 2024
Policy Number: CS-POL-010
Version: 1.3

================================================================================
1. POLICY OVERVIEW
================================================================================

This policy governs sales tax, value-added tax (VAT), customs duties, and 
related tax and duty inquiries for domestic and international orders. It 
clarifies our responsibilities versus customer responsibilities and provides 
guidance for handling tax and duty-related customer questions.

================================================================================
2. DOMESTIC SALES TAX
================================================================================

2.1 Sales Tax Collection
    We collect sales tax on orders shipped to addresses in jurisdictions
    where we have tax nexus (physical presence or economic activity
    thresholds). Sales tax is calculated based on:
    - Shipping address (destination-based)
    - Product taxability in that jurisdiction
    - Current tax rates at time of purchase
    
    Sales tax is displayed at checkout before order completion.

2.2 Tax-Exempt Purchases
    Tax-exempt purchases may be available for:
    - Qualified resellers (with valid resale certificate)
    - Tax-exempt organizations (with valid exemption certificate)
    - Certain product categories exempt in specific jurisdictions
    
    Tax exemption requires:
    - Valid exemption certificate provided before purchase
    - Certificate verification and approval
    - Tax exemption applied to account or specific order

2.3 Sales Tax Refunds
    If sales tax incorrectly charged:
    - Refund tax amount if error confirmed
    - Process refund within 1-2 business days
    - Tax refund appears in 5-10 business days
    - If tax-exempt certificate provided post-purchase: Refund tax if
      certificate valid and retroactively applicable

2.4 Sales Tax Inquiries
    Common customer questions:

output.reason: Tax/duty inquiry addressed. Taxes collected per regional requirements. Duties are customer responsibility for international orders.
output.customer_response: I can help you with this request. Let me process this for you right away.

LOYALTY POINTS AND REWARDS POLICY
Effective Date: January 1, 2024
Policy Number: CS-POL-008
Version: 1.4

================================================================================
1. POLICY OVERVIEW
================================================================================

This policy governs our loyalty program, including points earning, points 
redemption, points posting timelines, tier benefits, and points-related 
inquiries. All customer service representatives must understand these 
guidelines to properly assist customers with loyalty program questions and 
issues.

================================================================================
2. LOYALTY PROGRAM STRUCTURE
================================================================================

2.1 Membership Tiers
    Our loyalty program has four tiers:
    
    - Guest: No membership, no automatic benefits
    - Member: Free membership, 5% automatic discount, points earning
    - VIP: Enhanced membership, 10% automatic discount, bonus points,
      exclusive promotions
    - Employee: Special employee tier with employee-specific benefits
    
    Tier benefits are cumulative (VIP includes all Member benefits plus
    additional VIP benefits).

2.2 Points Earning Rate
    Points are earned on qualifying purchases:
    - Members: 1 point per $1 spent (1% back in points)
    - VIP: 1.5 points per $1 spent (1.5% back in points)
    - Employees: Per employee policy (confidential)
    - Guests: No points earned (must join program)

2.3 Qualifying Purchases
    Points are earned on:
    - Product purchases (full price, sale, clearance)
    - Gift card purchases (points earned on purchase, not redemption)
    
    Points are NOT earned on:
    - Shipping fees
    - Taxes
    - Returns and refunds (points deducted if item returned)
    - Using points for purchase (no points on points)

================================================================================
3. POINTS POSTING TIMELINE
==

output.reason: Points typically post within 1-4 business days after shipment. Still within normal processing window.
output.customer_response: This is currently being processed. I'm monitoring the situation and will keep you updated. You should see resolution within the expected timeframe.

COMPLIANCE AND RESTRICTIONS POLICY
Effective Date: January 1, 2024
Policy Number: CS-POL-011
Version: 1.2

================================================================================
1. POLICY OVERVIEW
================================================================================

This policy governs product restrictions, regional compliance requirements, 
age restrictions, export controls, and regulatory compliance issues. It 
provides guidance for handling customer inquiries about restricted products, 
shipping restrictions, and compliance-related questions.

================================================================================
2. REGIONAL SHIPPING RESTRICTIONS
================================================================================

2.1 Restricted Regions
    Some products may not be available for shipment to certain regions due to:
    - Regulatory restrictions
    - Export controls
    - Product-specific regulations
    - Carrier limitations
    - Business decisions
    
    Restricted regions and products are identified in our system and at
    checkout.

2.2 Restricted Product Categories
    Certain product categories may have regional restrictions:
    - Electronics with specific certifications
    - Products with battery restrictions
    - Items subject to import regulations
    - Products requiring special licenses
    - Items restricted by destination country laws

2.3 Handling Restricted Orders
    If customer attempts to order restricted product:
    - System prevents order completion if restriction detected
    - Customer notified of restriction at checkout
    - Alternative products suggested if available
    - Explanation provided for restriction when possible
    - Customer service can clarify restrictions but cannot override

2.4 Regional Compliance Requirements
    Orders must comply with:
    - Destination country import regulations
    - Product-specific regulations (safety, certification, etc.)
    - Export control law

output.reason: Shipping restrictions are legal requirements and cannot be overridden. Alternative products may be available.
output.customer_response: I understand your request. While I can't accommodate this specific request per our policy, let me explain the policy and see what alternatives we can offer.

    - Delivery Time: 10-21 business days depending on destination
    - Customs and duties: Customer responsibility
    - Tracking: Provided where available

================================================================================
3. DELIVERY DELAYS AND COMPENSATION
================================================================================

    Delivery delays are categorized as follows:
    
    - Minor Delay: 1-3 business days beyond estimated delivery

TAX AND DUTY POLICY
Effective Date: January 1, 2024
Policy Number: CS-POL-010
Version: 1.3

================================================================================
1. POLICY OVERVIEW
================================================================================

This policy governs sales tax, value-added tax (VAT), customs duties, and 
related tax and duty inquiries for domestic and international orders. It 
clarifies our responsibilities versus customer responsibilities and provides 
guidance for handling tax and duty-related customer questions.

================================================================================
2. DOMESTIC SALES TAX
================================================================================

2.1 Sales Tax Collection
    We collect sales tax on orders shipped to addresses in jurisdictions
    where we have tax nexus (physical presence or economic activity
    thresholds). Sales tax is calculated based on:
    - Shipping address (destination-based)
    - Product taxability in that jurisdiction
    - Current tax rates at time of purchase
    
    Sales tax is displayed at checkout before order completion.

2.2 Tax-Exempt Purchases
    Tax-exempt purchases may be available for:
    - Qualified resellers (with valid resale certificate)
    - Tax-exempt organizations (with valid exemption certificate)
    - Certain product categories exempt in specific jurisdictions
    
    Tax exemption requires:
    - Valid exemption certificate provided before purchase
    - Certificate verification and approval
    - Tax exemption applied to account or specific order

2.3 Sales Tax Refunds
    If sales tax incorrectly charged:
    - Refund tax amount if error confirmed
    - Process refund within 1-2 business days
    - Tax refund appears in 5-10 business days
    - If tax-exempt certificate provided post-purchase: Refund tax if
      certificate valid and retroactively applicable

2.4 Sales Tax Inquiries
    Common customer questions:

output.reason: Tax/duty inquiry addressed. Taxes collected per regional requirements. Duties are customer responsibility for international orders.

================================================================================

This policy governs order modifications including cancellations, address 
changes, size/color changes, and item substitutions. It defines when 
modifications are possible and the procedures for processing them. All customer 
service representatives must understand these guidelines to properly handle 
order modification requests.

================================================================================
2. ORDER MODIFICATION WINDOWS
================================================================================

2.1 Modification Eligibility by Order Stage
    Order modifications are possible only during specific stages of order
    fulfillment:
    
    a) Order Placed (Not Yet Processed)
       - Cancellation: Available
       - Address Change: Available
       - Size/Color Change: Available
       - Item Addition: Available (if inventory allows)
       - Item Removal: Available
    
    b) Order Processing (Picked, Not Yet Shipped)
       - Cancellation: Limited availability (may require escalation)
       - Address Change: Available (with potential delay)
       - Size/Color Change: Limited (requires cancellation and reorder)
       - Item Addition: Not available
       - Item Removal: Limited availability
    
    c) Order Shipped (In Transit)
       - Cancellation: Not available (order in transit)
       - Address Change: Limited (contact carrier, not guaranteed)
       - Size/Color Change: Not available (process return after delivery)
       - Item Addition: Not available
       - Item Removal: Not available
    
    d) Order Delivered
       - All modifications: Not available (use return/exchange process)

========================================================================

output.reason: Order has shipped. Use return/exchange process after delivery.

legitimate fraud victims.

    If customer cannot verify identity, escalate to fraud specialist team.
    Do NOT process refunds or make account changes without verification.

2.3 Investigation Process
    Upon verified fraud claim:
    - Immediately flag account for security review
    - Freeze account if multiple suspicious activities detected
    - Review recent

WARRANTY POLICY
Effective Date: January 1, 2024
Policy Number: CS-POL-006
Version: 1.5

================================================================================
1. POLICY OVERVIEW
================================================================================

This policy governs warranty claims for manufacturing defects and product 
quality issues. It defines what is covered under warranty, warranty duration, 
claim procedures, and resolution processes. All customer service 
representatives must understand these guidelines to properly evaluate and 
process warranty claims.

================================================================================
2. WARRANTY COVERAGE
================================================================================

2.1 Standard Warranty Period
    We provide a manufacturer's warranty covering manufacturing defects for a
    period of ONE (1) YEAR from the date of purchase. This warranty applies to
    all products sold through our channels unless otherwise stated.

2.2 What is Covered
    The warranty covers manufacturing defects including but not limited to:
    
    - Material defects: Fabric tears, material failure, premature wear due to
      manufacturing issues
    - Construction defects: Seam failures, sole separation, zipper malfunctions,
      button/closure failures
    - Sizing defects: Incorrect size labels (item does not match labeled size)
    - Component defects: Missing parts, defective hardware (buckles, clasps,
      etc.), faulty electronics in smart products
    - Color/finish defects: Premature fading, color bleeding, finish defects
      not caused by normal wear
    - Manufacturing errors: Items that do not meet stated specifications due to
      production errors

2.3 What is NOT Covered

    - Export control law

Policy Number: CS-POL-007
Version: 1.3

================================================================================
1. POLICY OVERVIEW
================================================================================

This policy governs order modifications including cancellations, address 
changes, size/color changes, and item substitutions. It defines when 
modifications are possible and the procedures for processing them. All customer 
service representatives must understand these guidelines to properly handle 
order modification requests.

================================================================================
2. ORDER MODIFICATION WINDOWS
================================================================================

2.1 Modification Eligibility by Order Stage
    Order modifications are possible only during specific stages of order
    fulfillment:
    
    a) Order Placed (Not Yet Processed)
       - Cancellation: Available
       - Address Change: Available
       - Size/Color Change: Available
       - Item Addition: Available (if inventory allows)
       - Item Removal: Available
    
    b) Order Processing (Picked, Not Yet Shipped)
       - Cancellation: Limited availability (may require escalation)
       - Address Change: Available (with potential delay)
       - Size/Color Change: Limited (requires cancellation and reorder)
       - Item Addition: Not available
       - Item Removal: Limited availability
    
    c) Order Shipped (In Transit)
       - Cancellation: Not available (order in transit)
       - Address Change: Limited (contact carrier, not guaranteed)
       - Size/Color Change: Not available (process return after delivery)
       - Item Addition: Not available
       - Item Removal: Not available
    
    d) Order Delivered
       - All modifications: Not available (use return/exchange process)

========================================================================

PROMOTIONS AND PRICING POLICY
Effective Date: January 1, 2024
Policy Number: CS-POL-003
Version: 2.3

================================================================================
1. POLICY OVERVIEW
================================================================================

This policy governs all promotional offers, discounts, pricing adjustments, 
price matching, and related customer inquiries. All customer service 
representatives must strictly adhere to these guidelines to ensure consistent 
application of promotional terms and prevent unauthorized discounts.

================================================================================
2. RETROACTIVE PROMOTIONS
================================================================================

2.1 General Rule: NO RETROACTIVE APPLICATIONS
    Promotional codes, discounts, and sale prices apply ONLY to purchases made
    DURING the active promotion period. We do NOT apply promotions retroactively
    to orders placed before a promotion begins, even if the promotion starts
    shortly after the original purchase date.

2.2 Promotion Period Definition
    - Start Date: Promotion begins at 12:01 AM in the promotion's primary
      time zone (typically Eastern Time for US promotions)
    - End Date: Promotion ends at 11:59 PM in the promotion's primary time zone
    - Orders must be placed AND confirmed within this window to qualify

2.3 Exceptions to Retroactive Rule
    The following situations MAY qualify for retroactive price adjustment
    (requires supervisor approval):
    
    a) Order placed within 24 hours before promotion start AND customer
       contacts us within 48 hours of promotion start
    b) Technical error prevented customer from applying valid promotion code
       at time of purchase (verified through system logs)
    c) Customer service error where representative incorrectly stated promotion
       would apply retroactively
    
    All exceptions require:
    - Supervisor approval

output.reason: Clearance item promotion eligibility varies and requires review.

================================================================================
1. POLICY OVERVIEW
================================================================================

This policy governs all returns and exchanges for products purchased through our 
online, mobile, and retail channels. All customer service representatives must 
adhere strictly to these guidelines to ensure consistent application of our 
return and exchange procedures across all regions and customer tiers.

================================================================================
2. RETURN WINDOW AND ELIGIBILITY
================================================================================

2.1 Standard Return Window
    Returns are accepted within the following timeframes from the date of 
    delivery, as confirmed by carrier tracking:
    
    - United States (US): 60 calendar days
    - Canada (CA): 60 calendar days
    - European Union (EU): 30 calendar days
    - United Kingdom (UK): 30 calendar days
    - Australia (AU): 45 calendar days
    
    The return window begins on the date of delivery, not the date of purchase.

2.2 Eligible Items for Return
    Items are eligible for return if they meet ALL of the following criteria:
    
    a) Returned within the applicable return window (Section 2.1)
    b) In original, unworn condition with all original tags attached
    c) In original packaging when applicable
    d) Not classified as final sale, clearance, or special promotion items
      (unless explicitly stated otherwise in the promotion terms)
    
2.3 Condition Requirements
    Items must be in one of the following acceptable conditions:
    
    - Unworn: Item has never been worn or used, with all tags and packaging intact
    - Tried Indoors: Item was tried on indoors only, shows no signs of wear,
      and all tags remain attached
    
    Items in the following c

ORDER MODIFICATION POLICY
Effective Date: January 1, 2024
Policy Number: CS-POL-007
Version: 1.3

================================================================================
1. POLICY OVERVIEW
================================================================================

This policy governs order modifications including cancellations, address 
changes, size/color changes, and item substitutions. It defines when 
modifications are possible and the procedures for processing them. All customer 
service representatives must understand these guidelines to properly handle 
order modification requests.

================================================================================
2. ORDER MODIFICATION WINDOWS
================================================================================

2.1 Modification Eligibility by Order Stage
    Order modifications are possible only during specific stages of order
    fulfillment:
    
    a) Order Placed (Not Yet Processed)
       - Cancellation: Available
       - Address Change: Available
       - Size/Color Change: Available
       - Item Addition: Available (if inventory allows)
       - Item Removal: Available
    
    b) Order Processing (Picked, Not Yet Shipped)
       - Cancellation: Limited availability (may require escalation)
       - Address Change: Available (with potential delay)
       - Size/Color Change: Limited (requires cancellation and reorder)
       - Item Addition: Not available
       - Item Removal: Limited availability
    
    c) Order Shipped (In Transit)
       - Cancellation: Not available (order in transit)
       - Address Change: Limited (contact carrier, not guaranteed)
       - Size/Color Change: Not available (process return after delivery)
       - Item Addition: Not available
       - Item Removal: Not available
    
    d) Order Delivered
       - All modifications: Not available (use return/exchange process)

========================================================================

output.reason: Order has shipped. Use return/exchange process after delivery.
output.customer_response: I understand your request. While I can't accommodate this specific request per our policy, let me explain the policy and see what alternatives we can offer.

COMPLIANCE AND RESTRICTIONS POLICY
Effective Date: January 1, 2024
Policy Number: CS-POL-011
Version: 1.2

================================================================================
1. POLICY OVERVIEW
================================================================================

This policy governs product restrictions, regional compliance requirements, 
age restrictions, export controls, and regulatory compliance issues. It 
provides guidance for handling customer inquiries about restricted products, 
shipping restrictions, and compliance-related questions.

================================================================================
2. REGIONAL SHIPPING RESTRICTIONS
================================================================================

2.1 Restricted Regions
    Some products may not be available for shipment to certain regions due to:
    - Regulatory restrictions
    - Export controls
    - Product-specific regulations
    - Carrier limitations
    - Business decisions
    
    Restricted regions and products are identified in our system and at
    checkout.

2.2 Restricted Product Categories
    Certain product categories may have regional restrictions:
    - Electronics with specific certifications
    - Products with battery restrictions
    - Items subject to import regulations
    - Products requiring special licenses
    - Items restricted by destination country laws

2.3 Handling Restricted Orders
    If customer attempts to order restricted product:
    - System prevents order completion if restriction detected
    - Customer notified of restriction at checkout
    - Alternative products suggested if available
    - Explanation provided for restriction when possible
    - Customer service can clarify restrictions but cannot override

2.4 Regional Compliance Requirements
    Orders must comply with:
    - Destination country import regulations
    - Product-specific regulations (safety, certification, etc.)
    - Export control law

output.reason: Shipping restrictions are legal requirements and cannot be overridden. Alternative products may be available.

LOYALTY POINTS AND REWARDS POLICY
Effective Date: January 1, 2024
Policy Number: CS-POL-008
Version: 1.4

================================================================================
1. POLICY OVERVIEW
================================================================================

This policy governs our loyalty program, including points earning, points 
redemption, points posting timelines, tier benefits, and points-related 
inquiries. All customer service representatives must understand these 
guidelines to properly assist customers with loyalty program questions and 
issues.

================================================================================
2. LOYALTY PROGRAM STRUCTURE
================================================================================

2.1 Membership Tiers
    Our loyalty program has four tiers:
    
    - Guest: No membership, no automatic benefits
    - Member: Free membership, 5% automatic discount, points earning
    - VIP: Enhanced membership, 10% automatic discount, bonus points,
      exclusive promotions
    - Employee: Special employee tier with employee-specific benefits
    
    Tier benefits are cumulative (VIP includes all Member benefits plus
    additional VIP benefits).

2.2 Points Earning Rate
    Points are earned on qualifying purchases:
    - Members: 1 point per $1 spent (1% back in points)
    - VIP: 1.5 points per $1 spent (1.5% back in points)
    - Employees: Per employee policy (confidential)
    - Guests: No points earned (must join program)

2.3 Qualifying Purchases
    Points are earned on:
    - Product purchases (full price, sale, clearance)
    - Gift card purchases (points earned on purchase, not redemption)
    
    Points are NOT earned on:
    - Shipping fees
    - Taxes
    - Returns and refunds (points deducted if item returned)
    - Using points for purchase (no points on points)

================================================================================
3. POINTS POSTING TIMELINE
==

PROMOTIONS AND PRICING POLICY
Effective Date: January 1, 2024
Policy Number: CS-POL-003
Version: 2.3

================================================================================
1. POLICY OVERVIEW
================================================================================

This policy governs all promotional offers, discounts, pricing adjustments, 
price matching, and related customer inquiries. All customer service 
representatives must strictly adhere to these guidelines to ensure consistent 
application of promotional terms and prevent unauthorized discounts.

================================================================================
2. RETROACTIVE PROMOTIONS
================================================================================

2.1 General Rule: NO RETROACTIVE APPLICATIONS
    Promotional codes, discounts, and sale prices apply ONLY to purchases made
    DURING the active promotion period. We do NOT apply promotions retroactively
    to orders placed before a promotion begins, even if the promotion starts
    shortly after the original purchase date.

2.2 Promotion Period Definition
    - Start Date: Promotion begins at 12:01 AM in the promotion's primary
      time zone (typically Eastern Time for US promotions)
    - End Date: Promotion ends at 11:59 PM in the promotion's primary time zone
    - Orders must be placed AND confirmed within this window to qualify

2.3 Exceptions to Retroactive Rule
    The following situations MAY qualify for retroactive price adjustment
    (requires supervisor approval):
    
    a) Order placed within 24 hours before promotion start AND customer
       contacts us within 48 hours of promotion start
    b) Technical error prevented customer from applying valid promotion code
       at time of purchase (verified through system logs)
    c) Customer service error where representative incorrectly stated promotion
       would apply retroactively
    
    All exceptions require:
    - Supervisor approval

output.reason: Price protection applies within 7 days of purchase for price drops on same item.
output.customer_response: I'm happy to apply this promotion to your order. The discount will be reflected in your refund or next purchase.
output.next_action: Apply promotion and process price adjustment
